name: TableRowCollection
description: Represents a collection of all the rows that are part of the table.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: count
properties.description: Returns the number of rows in the table.

methods.name: getItemAt
methods.description: Gets a row based on its position in the collection.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index value of the object to be retrieved. Zero-indexed.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new row to the table.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Specifies the relative position of the new row. If null, the addition happens at the end. Any rows below the inserted row are shifted downwards. Zero-indexed.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: A 2-dimensional array of unformatted values of the table row.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
